meta.title: Duality: Portrait in Fracture and Harmony by Eliran Bar-On
meta.description: This oil painting explores human duality, depicting the same face twice with subtle differences to convey emotional contrast.

openGraph.og:title: Duality: Portrait in Fracture and Harmony by Eliran Bar-On
openGraph.og:description: Eliran Bar-On’s portrait ‘Duality’ presents the same face twice with emotional contrasts, revealing the complexity of human nature.

structuredData.name: Duality: Portrait in Fracture and Harmony
structuredData.description: This oil painting explores the concept of human duality, showing the same face from two angles and expressing contrasting emotions.
